price: 19. (Angelas) tarė: „Aš tiktai tavo Viešpaties pasiuntinys (pranešti) tau apie dovaną – teisingą sūnų.“
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
